title: Hostel Management System (Major)
description: A Hotel Management System built using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js) allows users to manage hotel room bookings online, including searching for availability,making reservations. all within a user-friendly interface with features like user authentication and admin dashboards.

title: AirBnb WanderLust (Major)
description: Developed a full-featured Airbnb using JavaScript, EJS, CSS, Node.js,Express.js and MongoDB. Handled all backend functionalities.

title: Simon-Says-Game
description: Developed an interactive Simon-Says-Game using JavaScript, CSS, and HTML. Implemented game logic to replicate the classic memory game.

title: Lobe Tour Clone
description: Created a responsive clone of the Lobe Tour website using HTML and CSS. Focused on  layout of the original site to enhance web development and styling skills.
